channel.title: How-it-works on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in How-it-works on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Partnership
item.description: Standard data license templates are signed between Data Partners and each participating organization (e.

item.title: Project Proposals
item.description: Data Partners uses the Partnership portal to evaluate project proposals submitted by staff of international organizations (Development Partners).

item.title: Data Management
item.description: Upon project approval, data are securely and responsibly ingested, stored, and managed through the Partnership IT architecture and procedures.

item.title: Data Goods
item.description: Data Partners are kept updated through the Partnership portal of derived data products and new methods.
